text: Clive Michael Charles (3 October 1951 â€“ 26 August 2003) was an English football player, coach and television announcer. He was one of five National Collegiate Athletic Association (NCAA) coaches to win more than 400 games. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2003 deaths Category:Cardiff City F.C. players Category:Footballers from London Category:People from Barking
